title: Awkwafina
description:
Kevin is joined by comedian and actress Awkwafina on this episode. They discuss her rise from YouTube star to blockbuster actress, working with companies like Marvel and Comedy Central, the time she starred with Kevin in Jumanji, and why there’s no handbook on how to deal with fame and success.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Awkwafina, Nora Lum, Kevin Hart)
